data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir, Durucan, Furkan, Zawal, Andrzej (2019): Marine mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia) of the Mediterranean Sea: Descriptions of two new species, key for identification and future prospects. Zootaxa 4585 (3): 501-516, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4585.3.6|4 occurrences
